name: Jank Saves the World
description:
This planet's a mess, but Jank's on the job in this quirky 3D platformer with a distinctive hand-drawn art style. Armed with an oversized wrench and a trusty trash gun, this robot is ready to save the world!

  • This is currently a MVP demo version. For development updates on the full game, follow us on twitter or sign up for emails! 

Email List  https://janksavestheworld.boxmode.io/

Twitter  @JankSavesWorld
